liquibase.util.StringUtils

liquibase.util.StringUtils Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Various utility methods for working with strings.

static String[] processMutliLineSQL (String multiLineSQL, boolean stripComments)
 Removes any comments from multiple line SQL using stripComments(String) and then extracts each individual statement using splitSQL(String).
static String[] splitSQL (String multiLineSQL)
 Splits a (possible) multi-line SQL statement along ;'s and "go"'s.
static String stripComments (String multiLineSQL)
 Searches through a String which contains SQL code and strips out any comments that are between \/**\/ or anything that matches SP--SP<text>
(to support the ANSI standard commenting of -- at the end of a line).

static String [] liquibase.util.StringUtils.processMutliLineSQL ( String  multiLineSQL,
boolean  stripComments 
) [static]

Removes any comments from multiple line SQL using stripComments(String) and then extracts each individual statement using splitSQL(String).

Parameters:
multiLineSQL A String containing all the SQL statements
stripComments If true then comments will be stripped, if false then they will be left in the code

static String liquibase.util.StringUtils.stripComments ( String  multiLineSQL  )  [static]

Searches through a String which contains SQL code and strips out any comments that are between \/**\/ or anything that matches SP--SP<text>
(to support the ANSI standard commenting of -- at the end of a line).

Returns:
The String without the comments in
